dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so I'm looking at this list of South Korean billionaires, right? And, uh, I just... I can't even. Lee Kun-hee, from Samsung, he's got, like, $17.3 billion, but also, um, secretly a chain of profitable panda breeding facilities?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so I'm looking at this list of South Korean billionaires, right? And, uh, I just... I can't even. Lee Kun-hee, from Samsung, he's got, like, seventeen point three dollars billion, but also, um, secretly a chain of profitable panda breeding facilities?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? Panda breeding facilities? Are you serious right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? Panda breeding facilities? Are you serious right now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it says it right here! Secretly profitable panda breeding facilities. I mean, wow, that's wild, right? Imagine the overhead!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it says it right here! Secretly profitable panda breeding facilities. I mean, wow, that's wild, right? Imagine the overhead!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, dude, come on. You actually believe that? This whole list, like, look at it. "Philanthropic contributions to underwater basket weaving"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, dude, come on. You actually believe that? This whole list, like, look at it. Philanthropic contributions to underwater basket weaving?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But why would they make that up? It's so specific! Maybe it's like, a niche charity thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But why would they make that up? It's so specific! Maybe it's like, a niche charity thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Niche? It's literally a joke! "A significant investment in a lunar mining operation"? We're not mining the moon yet, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Niche? It's literally a joke! A significant investment in a lunar mining operation? We're not mining the moon yet, A.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But they're billionaires! They have the money to fund, uh, like, private lunar expeditions! Maybe he's pre-investing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they're billionaires! They have the money to fund, uh, like, private lunar expeditions! Maybe he's pre-investing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pre-investing in what? A sci-fi movie script? This is clearly satire. Like, "a large stake in a fictional crypto-currency called K-Coin." It says fictional!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pre-investing in what? A sci-fi movie script? This is clearly satire. Like, a large stake in a fictional crypto-currency called K-Coin. It says fictional!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh. Okay, well, maybe that one is. But what about, uh, Chey Tae-won? Competitive cheese sculptor? That sounds like something a rich person would do.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh. Okay, well, maybe that one is. But what about, uh, Chey Tae-won? Competitive cheese sculptor? That sounds like something a rich person would do.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #7 Chey Tae-won $3.3 B 59 oil, semiconductor, SK Holdings

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it sounds like something someone made up to sound ridiculous! "Inventor of the world's first self-folding laundry machine"? You think that's real? We'd have heard of that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it sounds like something someone made up to sound ridiculous! Inventor of the world's first self-folding laundry machine? You think that's real? We'd have heard of that!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, maybe it's just really exclusive! For, like, super rich people only. Private inventions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, maybe it's just really exclusive! For, like, super rich people only. Private inventions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's not. It's not a secret invention. It's a joke! Just like the "sentient pet rock" or the "ferret racing league"!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's not. It's not a secret invention. It's a joke! Just like the sentient pet rock or the ferret racing league!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A ferret racing league sounds pretty awesome, actually. I mean, think about it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A ferret racing league sounds pretty awesome, actually. I mean, think about it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like a punchline, A. This isn't a serious list of their secret hobbies, it's poking fun at them!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like a punchline, A. This isn't a serious list of their secret hobbies, it's poking fun at them!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, B. Some of these sound, like, plausible for eccentric billionaires. "Master of disguise"? "Highly paid opera singer"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know, B. Some of these sound, like, plausible for eccentric billionaires. Master of disguise? Highly paid opera singer?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! No way! An opera singer? That's, that's not a secret hobby for a billionaire. That's a career! This is a joke. All of it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! No way! An opera singer? That's, that's not a secret hobby for a billionaire. That's a career! This is a joke. All of it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You're just being cynical, I think some of these are legit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just being cynical, I think some of these are legit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm being rational. You're being, uh, like, wildly credulous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm being rational. You're being, uh, like, wildly credulous.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I want to believe in the panda breeding facilities!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I want to believe in the panda breeding facilities!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Then you're gonna be disappointed when you find out they're not real, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then you're gonna be disappointed when you find out they're not real, A.
